perk.name: art of the boot
perk.description: You have become a disciple of the way of Lee, Norris and Chan. A mighty boot can send enemies flying away and a devastating kick can break an enemy's guard lowering their dodge and parry. each cost 6 AP.

missText.text: you fail to land a mighty kick on TARGET .

hitText.text: you deliver a mighty kick to TARGET

effectStatus.applyText: TARGET is reeling from the might of your mighty boot

missText.text: you fail to land a guard break on TARGET .

hitText.text: you deliver a guard breaking kick to TARGET and inflicts VALUE damage
